channel.title: Bump in the Dark - Monster hunting, Forged in the Dark
channel.description:
Hi all! I haven't been around much lately, in large part because I've been busy at work on my game, *Bump in the Dark*! It's a lightweight FitD game with a flexible investigation system inspired by *External Containment Bureau* and *Brindlewood Bay*. You play as a hunter, someone who has dedicated their life to keeping regular people safe from the horrors of the darkness: cryptids, monsters, demons, and the nefarious factions vying to control the dark power of the void. It's a game about community, chosen family, and beating the shit out of monsters. I've been having a lot of fun designing and running it, and I'm super stoked to finally be able to share it with others. I'd love for you to take a look and maybe even pick up a copy, and I'm glad to answer any questions you might have about it!
You can find the game [here](https://jexjthomas.itch.io/bump-in-the-dark) and get updates on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/BumpDarkRPG).
